title: When Will I get my season rewards?
body: I got silver 5 and I was wondering when I will get my season rewards? Thanks.

replies.body:
Check out the [2017 Ranked Rewards Help Desk](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk) for more info on reward distribution!

The short answer is... be patient! Rewards will be distributed in the coming weeks :)

I should be getting a gold Boarder, icon, etc But I have none of them yet? 
Is it possible that I will still get all of my rewards later? Cuz as of now I have nothing. ;/

" All rewards arrive within one month of the end of season (some rewards may appear faster than others, so don’t worry if you don’t get them all at once) "

Actual Post Here: https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier2Pos2

Season rewards will be going out over the course of the next month, but I'm not actually 100% sure if they've even started delivering them yet or not. Wait a bit longer, and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still concerned.
